svg.content: <mxfile host="app.diagrams.net" modified="2020-03-20T13:19:52.796Z" agent="Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_15_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/80.0.3987.132 Safari/537.36 Edg/80.0.361.66" etag="8Tzu09G6jxgr3lgszUMW" version="12.8.8" type="onedrive"><diagram id="rcQygRWxz4_oSwniguan" name="Page-1"></diagram></mxfile>

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 381px; margin-left: 291px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 407px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
Vultr Cloud Server
1Core 2.2GH CPU
1GB RAM
32G SSD
1Gbps Network Access

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 330px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
用户的个人电脑
Windows 7以上 / Linux / macOS
2 Core CPU / 4G RAM / 至少 200MB 剩余硬盘空间

switch.text: 用户的个人电脑Windows 7以上 / Linux / macOS...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 410px; margin-left: 422px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
AuStudio 前端项目编译后生成
的静态文件（编译混淆压缩后的前端代码、图片素材等）会被部署到这台服务器上，由 Nginx 提供 HTTP 静态文件服务。系统不涉及后端计算，故无后端软件需要部署。

switch.text: AuStudio 前端项目编译后生成...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 296px; margin-left: 422px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
使用 Cloudflare 提供的 CDN
服务，加速静态文件分发

switch.text: 使用 Cloudflare 提供的 CDN...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 62px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div:
浏览器
只支持 Chrome 76 版本以上（Web Audio API 兼容性需要）

switch.text: 浏览器 只支持 Chrome 76 版本以上（Web Audio API 兼容性需要）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 155px; margin-left: 250px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;

div.div: Web 多轨音频编辑系统（AuStudio）

switch.text: Web 多轨音频编辑系统（AuStudio）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 121px; margin-left: 532px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
系统由纯前端实现，基于用户
计算机的本地文件系统和浏览器API。

switch.text: 系统由纯前端实现，基于用户 计算机的本地文件系统和浏览器API。
